thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Tencent Calls Off China-Wide Test of Credit-Scoring System

author: Chuin-Wei Yap
title: Tencent Calls Off China-Wide Test of Credit-Scoring System
text:
Chinese technology giant Tencent Holdings Ltd. canceled a nationwide test of a new credit-scoring system a day after rolling it out, blaming the brevity on the need for improvements.
Tencent, which owns popular mobile messaging platform WeChat, gave its nearly one billion users in China access on Wednesday to a service called Tencent Credit, which would generate a credit score for people who tapped on an icon.
